表.definition: exterior surface; family relationship via females; to show (one's opinion); a model; a table (listing information); a form; a meter (measuring sth)

表兄.definition: older male cousin via female line

表冊.definition: statistical form; book of tables or forms

表功.definition: to show off one's accomplishments (often derog.)

表叔.definition: son of grandfather's sister; son of grandmother's brother or sister; father's younger male cousin; (Hong Kong slang) mainlander

表哥.definition: older male cousin via female line

表妹.definition: younger female cousin via female line

表妹夫.definition: husband of younger female cousin via female line

表姊妹.definition: father's sister's daughters; maternal female cousin

表姐.definition: older female cousin via female line

表姐夫.definition: husband of older female cousin via female line

表姑.definition: father's female cousin via female line

表姪.definition: son of a male cousin via female line

表姪女.definition: daughter of a male cousin via female line

表嫂.definition: wife of older male cousin via female line

表字.definition: literary name (an alternative name of a person stressing a moral principle); courtesy name

表弟.definition: younger male cousin via female line

表弟妹.definition: wife of younger male cousin via female line; younger cousins via female line

表弟媳.definition: wife of younger male cousin via female line

表彰.definition: to honor; to commend; to cite (in dispatches)

表情包.definition: image macro; visual meme; sticker package; emoticon collection

表態.definition: to declare one's position; to say where one stands

表明.definition: to make clear; to make known; to state clearly; to indicate; known

表決.definition: to decide by vote; to vote

表演.definition: play; show; performance; exhibition; to perform; to act; to demonstrate; CL:場|场[chang3]

表演過火.definition: to overact; to overdo one's part

表現.definition: to show; to show off; to display; to manifest; expression; manifestation; show; display; performance (at work etc); behavior

表白.definition: to explain oneself; to express; to reveal one's thoughts or feelings; declaration; confession

表示.definition: (of sb) to express; to state; to show; (of sth) to indicate; to signify; to show; expression; manifestation

表裡.definition: the outside and the inside; one's outward show and inner thoughts; exterior and interior

表裡不一.definition: outside appearance and inner reality differ (idiom); not what it seems; saying one thing but meaning sth different

表裡如一.definition: external appearance and inner thoughts coincide (idiom); to say what one means; to think and act as one

表記.definition: sth given as a token; souvenir

表證.definition: superficial syndrome; illness that has not attacked the vital organs of the human body

表象.definition: outward appearance; superficial; (philosophy, psychology) representation; idea; (math.) representation

表述.definition: to express; to articulate; to formulate

表露.definition: to show; to reveal (one's feelings etc)

表露無遺.definition: to show in full light; to be revealed in its entirety

表面上.definition: outwardly; superficially; on the face of it

表面化.definition: to come to the surface; to become apparent

表面文章.definition: superficial show; going through the motions
